EmailTemplate.name: Your Boat is Ready!
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Boat Can't Wait to Meet you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Account.FirstName},
Check it out, your boat is just about finished in the Shop! I've taken a good look at it and I'm pleased to say, your new boat looks perfect and it tells me it can't wait to see you on {!Opportunity.Delivery_Date__c}.
I hope you're well and that this helps you envision your lives together on the water! We'll see you soon!
Yours in Boating,
{!User.Name} and your {!Opportunity.BoatId__c}
